title: Game size vs. Screen size?
body: My in-game screen size is really small compared to my monitor? Does anyone know how this can be fixed? I just got this computer, and I was really looking forward to playing league on it.{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: If you're on a 4k or exceeding 1080 then you might see screen issues especially if you task in and out often.  Your best bet would be to reduce your screen and in-game resolution or try swapping with another monitor.  I hope that helps!
